name: Cooking Mama 5 - Bon Appetit!
synopsis: The original kitchen diva that created the cooking genre is set to school you with 60 brand new mouth-watering recipes and over 30 household mini-games. Cook your way through classic fare, exotic cultural dishes and sweet treats to delight the palate! Fun stylus-based activities will keep you busy around the house and prove to Mama that youâ€™ve got the culinary chops to play in her kitchen!
